original_text: Each foot on the animal must have two separate parts. The animal must eat its food and then it must bring the food back into its mouth. And then it must eat the food again. Some animals eat their food twice and they have feet with two parts. You can eat those animals.
korean_text: 모든 짐승 중 굽이 갈라져 쪽발이 되고 새김질하는 것은 너희가 먹되

sentences.korean_translation: 두 개의 분리된 부분을 가져야 합니다

sentences.original_text: The animal must eat its food
and then it must bring the food back
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나서 먹이를 다시 가져와야 합니다

sentences.original_text: And then it must eat the food again
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나서 그 먹이를 다시 먹어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: Some animals eat their food twice
sentences.korean_translation: 일부 동물은 자신의 먹이를 두 번 먹습니다

sentences.original_text: and they have feet with two parts
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 두 부분으로 된 발을 가지고 있습니다
당신은 그 동물들을 먹을 수 있습니다
